====================
Required Packages
====================

This is simply a dependency list. For installation instructions on how to obtain these packages see the install page

Windows x86 (64 bit)
---------------------------

* `anaconda 2.7`_
* `numpy`_ via ``conda``
* `gdal`_ via ``conda``
* `matplotlib`_ via ``conda``
* `__future__`_

Linux
--------------------------

Mac
--------------------------
